菠菜.definition: spinach (CL:棵[ke1]); (slang) gambling; gambler (alternative term for 博彩[bo2cai3])

菠蘿包.definition: pineapple bun, a sweet bun popular esp. in Hong Kong (typically does not contain pineapple – the name comes from the rough top crust which resembles pineapple skin)

菠蘿油.definition: pineapple bun 菠蘿包|菠萝包[bo1luo2bao1] with a slice of butter inserted
